column20:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Running shoes from Erke that are comfortable and stylish. The sleek design doesn't compromise on your fashion quotient while the clever craftsmanship ensures that you get the perfect support and comfort during your running sessions.

  • Product Details

  • Round toed black running shoes with green accents and a mesh upper
    Synthetic overlays throughout
    Branding on one side at midfoot region
    Central lace up closure
    Soft padded tongue with a mesh upper and branding
    Reinforced overlay at the toe
    Soft padded footbed with branding
    Reinforced overlay at the heel collar with branding
    Textured outsole with grooves
    Comes with an extra pair of laces
    Warranty: 3 months from the date of purchase against manufacturing defects

  • Material & Care

  • Mesh
column22:
synthetic
Wipe with a clean cloth when needed
